description: My bright double bedroom with a large window has a relaxed feeling! It comfortably fits one or two and is centrally located just two blocks from Finsbury Park. I trust anyone who will be responding to this add would treat my home with care and respect .  Best Wishes  Alina Guest will have access to the self catering kitchen and bathroom. Walking distance to Twickenham Stadium, 35 min drive to Wimbledon Tennis! London borough of Richmond. This is a spacious Bedsit + En-Suite at the top of a large Victorian family house.
